Name: Pounce Cat
About the game: This precision platformer will put your skills and patience to the test. Pounce Cat may seem cute on the surface, but ahead lies a challenge, are you good enough to take it on? Gameplay: -You are your own worst enemy! Take your time and think about your actions. A small mistake could cost you. -Had enough for one day? Your progress is saved on quitting. Movement: -Charge your jump to pounce higher, but be careful not to fall. (Comes with cat bum wiggle animation while charging) -Once you're in the air there's no turning back. You'll either land safely or with a thud. There is no in-between. Atmosphere: A fantasy style, pixel world complete with a rather cute cat. Do you have the skills and patience to make it to the top?
